overview: BetBomb.com is all of the excitement of betting on your favorite sports teams with none of the gamble. Players can make picks against real spreads, lines and totals for both major league and college sports. This includes Major League Baseball (MLB), National Football League (NFL), National Hockey League (NHL), National Basketball Association (NBA), as well as National College Association (NCAA) football and basketball. The service is absolutely free and players compete for terrific prizes. BetBomb.com strives to be the greatest, most professional, totally free and most importantly completely legal betting site on the internet.
